name: Poly Fishing
description:
Poly Fishing is a relaxing fishing game. You don't need to have a lot of fishing knowledge in real life. Just sit back, start fishing, and enjoy yourself!

Key Features:

  • Low poly style
  • Keep fishing can raise fish's price
  • Collect coins to increase fish's level
  • Complete quest and reward useful skills
  • Different terrain has different fishes
  • Use your skills to catch special fishes
